name: Elphidran Aqua

aura.name: amicable_water_dragon
aura.description:
Can be ridden as a flying mount.
While fighting together, Fire Pals drop more items when defeated.

description: It possesses a demeanor as pure as its appearance suggests. Perhaps because of this, it harbors no ill will in any of its actions and is indifferent even after killing someone.

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: mystic_whirlwind
skills.description: Elphidran's exclusive skill. Generates twin whirlwinds imbued with a mysterious power that pursues enemies.

skills.name: acid_rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: hydro_laser
skills.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
